channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
hello, i was just woundering a few questions, my questions are, 1.How do i add animations to npc's for ex. make a man use the right attack emote istead of becomeing some odd messed up model when ever he/she walks or attacks? and no thats the the npc im having trouble with, i was just woundering for npc's in general.
2.How do i change my tele gfx's for my normal teleport spells, AND my ancients.
3.How do i Change where My teleport spells take me.
4. and finally, How do i Make my ice barrage gfx be right on the target npc instead of next to it? (i dont really care but it can be a lil annoying)
Info:: im using a 317 server,delta base i assume. and im not demanding for this help, if anyone can spare some time to point me in the right place for this stuff ill greatly appreciate it!

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @rangergodlv rangergodlv
item.description:
@rangergodlv wrote:

well you solved question # 3 so thank you but as for #1 i was just referring to normal rs monsters that are ment to be on a 317 server, like have you ever had a server where you attack like a goblin or something and when it hits you it streches everywhere and when it dies it like stretches in every direction? well thats what im trying to mostly solve, i want my servers animations to run smoothly, not willy nilly lol

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

  1. Class 5 of your client if it’s a custom NPC.

  2. I had this same problem before and never got any help. (I forgot about this problem until I searched for the answer on google, and stumbled upon my topic asking the same question.)

  3. Search the coords in your clicking class.

  4. I have no idea.

Read full topic
